head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COHEN, OSCAR J

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COHEN, OSCAR J

block.p: COHEN--Oscar J, on April 4th. Former assistant District Attorney for Frank Hogan. Loving husband of Shirley. Devoted father to Debbie Marcus. Dear brother to Millicent Aronoff. Adored grandfather to Danielle Gross and greatgrandfather to Jacob Tyler Gross. Services 11:30 today at Midwood Memorial Chapel 1625 Coney Island Ave, Brooklyn (corner Avenue M).

COHEN--Oscar J, on April 4th. Former assistant District Attorney for Frank Hogan. Loving husband of Shirley. Devoted father to Debbie Marcus. Dear brother to Millicent Aronoff. Adored grandfather to Danielle Gross and greatgrandfather to Jacob Tyler Gross. Services 11:30 today at Midwood Memorial Chapel 1625 Coney Island Ave, Brooklyn (corner Avenue M).
